body.name: Bright Led Desk Lamp for College Dorm - Foldable Study Desk Light for Home Office, Modern Dorm Study Desk Lamps, 5 Light Mode Dimmable Brightness Eye-Caring Craft Task Lamp Reading Desktop Lamp,Black

features: ⭐Various Lighting Modes: Transform Your Space With Ease: Unleash your creativity with our touch-controlled dimming. Adjust your lighting to suit your needs with just one click. Explore five color modes, from a comfortable 3000K to a vibrant 6000K. Imagine crafting, painting or studying bathed in perfect light. Each mode offers a range of brightness levels for each of your tasks. Let your imagination run wild with lights that are as inspiring as you are.

⭐Upgrade Eye Protection Desk Lamp: Experience a new level of eye comfort with our advanced LED desk light. Crafted with 50 energy-saving lamp beads, it has a high color rendering index (Ra>80%) and is tailor-made for various tasks. Say goodbye to glare, flicker and blue light hazards. Even after prolonged use, your eyes are still protected. Great for home office, reading, dorm room, study, nail art, jigsaw puzzles and more. Upgrade your workspace today!

⭐Foldable and Portable Design: For unrivaled flexibility: our lamp for desk is your dynamic partner and can be easily adjusted to your needs. The head rotates 360 degrees in both directions and tilts 180 degrees vertically. The arm folds vertically 90 degrees and is engineered with an aluminum alloy pole to project light to a wider area and provide stable support Its collapsible design saves desk space and lets you shine anywhere (office, living room, bedroom, dorm, etc.).

⭐Energy Saving and 45 Minutes Timer Off: No need to change bulbs! Our LED desk lamps for home office feature energy-efficient bulbs that use 85% less energy than older incandescent bulbs. The memory function supported by the office light can completely save your last settings, thus saving your precious time and energy. Turn on the 45-minute automatic timer function to make it easier to turn off the lights and fall asleep freely every night.

⭐USB power supply (AC adapter included: Say goodbye to extra costs - it comes with a 5V/1A adapter and a 1.5m power cord. You can even power it from a power bank or computer, hassle-free. But wait, there's more - we've added a USB charging port within easy reach. Charge your phone while you work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We Love This Little Lamp That Gives BIG Light To Our Desk. The Fact That U Can Dim And Also Change The Hue Is An Added ++ At Such An Inexpensive Price, And It Doesn't Get Hot.I Bought 2. Definitely Recommend 👍💪💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars USB charger port useless.Upper part moves horizontally too.To dim - press&hold on the power button
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My thoughts on "Bright Led Desk Lamp for College Dorm":There are a few things that I like about this lamp and some that I really do not like.I DO LIKEIt has a nice, sleek design and can be folded easily. The instructions and the information on the box do not show that the upper beam can be moved vertically (180 degrees) and they do not mention that the upper part can be moved horizontally. I have discovered that the beam can change its position also horizontally, which made me very happy.The base could have been heavier to my liking but it should do its job, as it is. It has a good padding. The base is made of plastic; the arms are made of some kind of metal.The USB cord would be probably too short (~48 inches) if the grid outlet is located close to the floor.The light is bright and there is a decent selection of color temperatures. It has also a 45 minute timer to turn off the light, that might be useful (e.g., falling into sleep and having light on for some time).I DO NOT LIKEThere are two things that I do not like about this lamp. The USB charger port is useless. When I plug in my phone, the estimated charging time is about 6-8h(!). I tried a few USB cables but it did not matter. It is why I took one star off the rating.The second thing I did not like was that I could not find how to dim the light. The instructions, the information on the box and the description of the product on the website claim that the lamp is "infinitely dimmable" but there is no info how to dim the light. There is no special button, neither the slider on the lamp. I read some reviews and reviewers mentioned that the power button needs to be held which, indeed works and results in dimming the light.SUMMARYIn summary, I like the lamp, its sleek design, and brightness. The 45-minute timer is a convenient option. The instructions do not mention that to dim the light you need to press and hold the power button. They do not mention that the upper part can be moved in both directions: vertical and horizontal. The USB charging port is useless for me (6-8h estimated charging time for the phone).Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice light!
reviews.reviewText: Like it alot! Useful for nighttime viewing while working on the desk. Sleek look, light options are nice. Haven't used the USB port, but it's available if needed. Light stays where angled, 3 light choices are nice. Takes up little room which I wanted. Glad I found this desk light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality LED desk lamp exceeds my expectations.
reviews.reviewText: I need a desk lamp to replace my old one. I found this LED desk lamp with 5 light modes and eye-caring concerns in the design of the lamp. It is very good for me as I always use the computer for a long time, and handle paperwork or read on the desk as well. So I need a good desk lamp. This LED desktop can meet my requirements. My eyes don't become tired easily. The folding design makes it a space saver, it can be folded up when it is not in use. The lamp is powered by the connection of the USB-C cable and at the same time it can charge other electronic devices through the built-in USB port. It has touch buttons on the base of the lamp to control the lamp so it is kind of trendy. The lamp looks sturdy and durable too. For the price of less than $20, I would say it exceeds my expectations. I would recommend this lamp to my friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Top is bent but light works ok
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, the lamp I received has a slightly bent top. It's not terrible, but it is very noticeable. I don't care that much because I'm in a temporary space and I didn't get this for aesthetics, but quality control seems to be lacking and it looks like these lamps are hit or miss. Out of the box, mine works ok. There's no high pitch noise and the top of the lamp is easily adjustable without collapsing. I have it at the angle I want so I probably won't touch it again. I'll just try to move it around from the base.I like that there are three different light settings ranging from warm to normal to cool, and a timer for 45 minutes of use. All of the settings are accessible by a quick and light touch so no reaching for a switch on a cord to power this on and off. The lamp has a sleek minimalist design and doesn't take up too much space on my desk so that's a plus. Keep in mind the cord is pretty short so you'll have to put it near an outlet or have an extension cord on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, flexible, and brightness adjustable. Great for travel.
reviews.reviewText: When one spends his or her life travelling for work, little conveniences mean a lot. This lamp is just such a convenience. First, I do use mine at my home desk when there. I find it very bright, yet it can be dimmed to just the right level and the color temperature of the light can be changed. But, since it is only about 16 inches in length when folded it will fit in most suitcases and even carry-ons. And it is powered by a USB power adapter plug-in so it will work anywhere in the world with the propter adapter. And, when working late at night on reports for the next day's meetings having a real desk lamp rather than a hotel light makes like so much easier.
